title: The coppy of a letter written by a friend, to the Laird of Blaikwood and his answer, with the coppy of my Lord Angus's letter, from Utrecht, 21/11 January 1692. To My Lord Marquess of Dowglas his father, Edinburgh, 16th: August 1692.
author: Lawrie, William, d. 1700?
notes: Letters are signed: M. T: S:, Will: Lawrie, and Angus [i.e. James Douglas].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
